title: Science Practical Competency Enhancement Program Based on Complex Evaluation Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science theory and practical foundations
context.additional_context: Application of customized assessment systems to strengthen current practitioners' scientific field practical competencies

learning_goals: Comprehensive learner competency is assessed by integrating diverse evaluation methods (portfolio, discussion, practical performance).
Design and implement a blended assessment scenario combining peer and self-assessment in real-time online environments.
Ensure fairness and objectivity by utilizing digital assessment tools that reflect complex evaluation requirements.
Provide personalized feedback based on assessment results and establish learning improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
